items.sentence: Tom said that he thought Mary knew where John had found the key she\'d lost.
Tom said he wished that Mary and I wouldn\'t go out after dark by ourselves.
Tom thought Mary wouldn\'t be able to earn more than thirty dollars an hour.
After a hectic few days at work, Tom is looking forward to a change of pace.
After the game, Tom went back to the locker room without speaking to anyone.
An hour of sleep before midnight is worth two hours of sleep after midnight.
Do you speak the same language to your father that you speak to your mother?
Tom asked me if I knew anybody who could translate from French into English.
I don\'t know if we\'re going to be able to make it to Boston for Christmas.
Tom can\'t ride a bicycle very well yet, so his bicycle has training wheels.
Tom certainly wasn\'t making much noise last night when we passed his house.
Tom checked Mary\'s pulse and was relieved to find that she was still alive.
I think I\'ve figured out why Tom has never learned to speak French so well.
Mary was upset when she saw a picture of Tom\'s ex-girlfriend in his wallet.
There\'s nothing we can do to save Tom at this point. All we can do is pray.
You\'re the only person that I know who never complains about the food here.
I was surprised that Tom didn\'t want to do what everyone else wanted to do.
Tom wasn\'t able to talk Mary into baking a cake for John\'s birthday party.
I don\'t think it\'ll rain, but I\'ll take an umbrella just in case it does.
I can\'t tell you everything I\'ve been told because I\'ve been told not to.
A friend is someone who likes you even though he knows everything about you.

I have four computers, but two of them are so old I don\'t use them anymore.

Tom was waiting for Mary to leave, so he could get back to reading his book.
I don\'t know how long Tom lived in Boston, but it was at least three years.
Tom and Mary looked at each other with concerned expressions on their faces.
Tom became fairly fluent in French after about three years of intense study.
Tom wondered whether Mary was happy with how John had handled the situation.
Tom was knighted by the king after saving the princess from the evil dragon.
Tom finished cleaning the kitchen and then started cleaning the living room.
Tom thinks that if he had tried a little harder, he could have won the race.
Since the accident, Tom has given up hope of becoming a professional dancer.

The letter Tom received said that he should return home as soon as possible.
The only reason Tom went to the party was that he expected Mary to be there.
The police caught Tom red-handed, breaking into a house in our neighborhood.

It\'s possible that Tom was able to convince Mary to do his laundry for him.

When my doctor told me to eat more vegetables, he didn\'t mean french fries.
I bought an apple and an orange. I ate the apple and gave the orange to Tom.

Tom is going to be upset when he finds out that Mary forgot to pay the rent.
Tom doesn\'t need to worry about a thing. Mary will take care of everything.
The best way to learn a language is to live in a country where it\'s spoken.
This never would\'ve happened if you\'d done it the way I told you to do it.
